Package mockit.integration.junit4

Provides integration with JUnit 4.x test runners.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JMockit A test runner for JUnit 4.5+, with special modifications to integrate with JMockit.
JMockitTest A convenience base class for tests which use the JMockit toolkit with JUnit 4.5+.
 

Package mockit.integration.junit4 Description

Provides integration with JUnit 4.x test runners.

Contains special helper classes for users of JUnit 4.5+: the JMockit test runner which is nothing more than the standard JUnit 4.5/4.6 test runner integrated to JMockit, and the JMockitTest convenience base test class.

Also contains the "startup mock" implementation for integration with the JUnit 4.5+ test runner (JUnit 4.4 had a different test runner which was deprecated, and is no longer supported by JMockit).
